Common.lmi_data: Includes data from the IS 50V dataset by Landmælingar Íslands from 12/2020

Area.TSX_data_credit: TerraSAR-X (Deutsches Zentrum für Luft- und Raumfahrt); ÍslandsDEM (National Land Survey of Iceland)
Area.support_tungpt: Icelandic Student Innovation Fund of Rannís (Rannsóknamiðstöð Íslands), grant number: 2311501-1101; Institute of Earth Sciences, University of Iceland.
Area.tungpt: The pixel tracking data presented here covers the landslide to the north of Tungnakvíslarjökull, an outlet glacier of Mýrdalsjökull. Its movement is triggered by glacial retreat over the past century and has been occuring since at least 1945.
